content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner furnace (position x1)

### Coal mine at position(y)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position y1)

### Iron plate factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position z1)
- Inserter (position a) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position b) that connects the furnace at position x1 to the assembling machine at position z1

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting due to insufficient materials
- Ensure you have enough raw materials in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, crafting iron-gear-wheels requires both iron-plates and iron-gear-wheels.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors when inspecting furnace inventory
- Check the furnace's inventory after ensuring it has been supplied with the necessary materials for crafting.
